mainText: Dear apple i am sorry for your lose steve was truly a great man and did not deserve to die at such a young age. He was a visionary a true icon of of the brightness ahead in our future. Steve jobs was the face of apple but i believe you can manage without him you are the greatest people in the world I want to say thank you for all you have done for this world i have not had the pleasure of being to any of your events or test many of your devices but based on what i have i would have to say your company will live on forever and no event or tragedy will stop you Apple is Apple and i am very pleased to say Good Luck to you and please accept my  Condolences.
author: Gregory
